text: [Vspomni, Mukhammad,] kak My skazali tebe: "Voistinu, tvoy Gospod' ob"yemlet lyudey [znaniyem i moshch'yu]. Voistinu, videniye, kotoroye My pokazali tebe, a takzhe derevo, proklyatoye v Korane, - eto tol'ko ispytaniye ot Nas dlya lyudey. My ustrashayem ikh, no [ot etogo] lish' usilivayetsya ikh nepokornost'
